build: Athletic, lean-muscled warrior's frame honed by years of martial training.
face: Strong angular features, dark skin, sharp eyes that carry both wit and deep focus.
distinguishing_features: Calm, assessing gaze — the look of someone always sizing up the room.
Subtle scarring consistent with a life of combat and the road.
Carries himself with the deliberate ease of someone who knows exactly what he is capable of.
attire: Practical traveler's gear suited for both open road and close-quarters combat. Nothing flashy — function over form.
shehai_manifested_notes: When the Shehai is drawn, an icy blue-white radiance pulses around Wayn's sword hand. Breath fogs. Nearby metal frosts. The blade itself appears as a jagged, faceted edge of frozen light — cold, sharp, and unmistakably alive.
